name: MOYASHIBITO -Fun Game For Free
description:
"Crisp and crunchy! Great value!!
Low calorie and popular with women: ""Moyashi""
A game that allows you to grow them to your heart's content is
finally! Here…!!

And it's called
＿人人人人人人人＿
> MOYASHIBITO <
￣Y^Y^Y^Y^Y^Y￣

■Pull Moyashi out with a flick!■
• Harvest with an easy flick!
• Pull to your heart's content!

■Use a spray, water the ground!!■
• Increase moisture with the spray button! Moyashi love water!
• They grow faster if the ground is soaked!

■Enhance facilities, find new species!■
• Use cash from the harvest to enhance!
• New Moyashi when you enhance facilities…!?

■No extra charges!■
• Completely free! All-you-can-harvest!!
• Gacha? Items? What's that!!

■Reaction from overseas■
• Wow! So this is THE Moyashi!? So cool!
• This Moyashi would be great in a stir fry
• MOYASHIBITO puts the wife in a good mood!
• I've never played a game this healthy!
